ValidationRule.description: If Level is Product, then the Product Family, Product Description, Percentage, Minimum Revenue fields must be specified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Level__c , "Product") , OR(ISBLANK(Product_Family__c ), ISBLANK(Product_Description__c ) , ISBLANK( Percentage__c ) , ISBLANK(Minimum_Revenue__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Level is Product, then the Product Family, Product Description, Percentage, Minimum Revenue fields must be specified.
